attributes.action: Introduce the random drug testing of all members of parliament and the Police with the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like the introduce the random drug testing of all members of parliament with the UK, (including the prime minister) and police, where the information would be made available to the public. 

This is to ensure that hypocrisy doesn't run in the UK and to protect the public from thoughts who deem fit to criminalise the public for something they do them self's.
